languages.text: "Ладно, прекратите побои и выдайте пайки и воду несчастным".
"Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."
languages.original_text: "Ладно, прекратите побои и выдайте пайки и воду несчастным".

traits.locale_text: "Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."
"Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."

languages.text: « Très bien. Je vous ordonne de cesser vos maltraitances et de fournir à ces gens les rations et l'eau dont ils ont besoin. »
languages.original_text: "Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. Je vous ordonne de cesser vos maltraitances et de fournir à ces gens les rations et l'eau dont ils ont besoin. »

languages.text: «De acuerdo. Le ordeno que detenga las palizas y proporcione comida y agua a esa gente».
languages.original_text: "Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo. Le ordeno que detenga las palizas y proporcione comida y agua a esa gente».

languages.text: “很好，我命令你们禁止继续殴打船员，给这些人提供口粮和水。”
languages.original_text: "Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."

traits.locale_text: “很好，我命令你们禁止继续殴打船员，给这些人提供口粮和水。”

languages.text: 「素晴らしい。殴打をやめ、この人たちに配給と水を提供することを命じる」
languages.original_text: "Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい。殴打をやめ、この人たちに配給と水を提供することを命じる」

languages.text: "Sehr wohl. Ich befehle Euch, die Prügel zu beenden und diesen Leuten Rationen und Wasser zu geben."
languages.original_text: "Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr wohl. Ich befehle Euch, die Prügel zu beenden und diesen Leuten Rationen und Wasser zu geben."

languages.text: "Pekâlâ. Dayaklara son vererek bu insanlara kumanya ile su dağıtmanızı emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Very well. I command you to cease the beatings and provide those people with rations and water."
